Articles.Content:
In this game you add 1 word to the previous post's phrase.

Example:

User 1: Potatoes

User 2: Potatoes are

User 3: Potatoes are stupid

User 4: Potatoes are stupid and

You get the idea.

I'll start!

The
The wrong

The wrong idea

Unrelated: do we ever stop adding to the phrase and start a new one?

The wrong idea that

Unrelated: To above: I think that the point when it gets too large is to just copy paste it and add something to it.
The wrong idea that Jebidia
The wrong idea that Jebidiah has

The wrong idea that Jebediah has had

(I'm assuming it was Jebediah Kerman we're talking about and not a random person named Jebidiah)
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is
the wrong idea that jebediah has had is going
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very
The wrong idea that Jebidia has is going very awkwardly

The wrong idea that Jebidia has is going very awkwardly

Unrelated: You missed a word there.
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and

The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and sheep.

(And we now have our first complete sentence. So far this sounds like the start of a contract briefing.)

Well, Let's keep going!

The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and sheep. That

Well, Let's keep going!

The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and sheep. That

That has
The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and sheep. That has pickles

The wrong idea that Jebediah has had is going very awkwardly because of control loss to bananas and sheep. That has pickles

between
